questions.quote: Look, there was an awkward moment in the conversation. It never happened before.
Our neighbor that you... turned against.  Anyway, I told him it'd be fine with us if he wanted to let it stretch its wings out in the hallway.
Well, what's the problem? Now come on George. I told the big man you were moving on this. Now, don't let him down!
I mean he's a good fighter and a nice guy but I don't like him.
If there's anything you can do to get us a table we'd really appreciate it.
You knew I was having a millennium party, but you just had to throw yours on the same day!
What's to see? A woman from Norway, a guy from Kenya, and twenty thousand losers.
But you don't have to do this! This guy is waiting in my house.
I always talk about your hands - how they're so soft and milky white..
Yeah, you said it.  Uh, excuse me, Mr Wilhelm. Uh, do you really think... Well, is this downtown trip really necessary, you know, for the project?
